description.ar: يبدو أنني تدخلت في أحلام ما كان يجدر بي أن أمسّها. بطلة الرواية، وُلدت بقدرة على التدخل في أحلام الآخرين. هذه المرة، حسبتني سأعيش حياة السهولة عنوانها كابنة كونت محبوبة… ‘آنسة مينا، يبدو أن النجاة ليست من نصيبكِ في هذا الشتاء.’ مجددًا، حياة ميؤوس منها مثل حياتي السابقة. ولجعل الأمور أسوأ، فإن عائلتي على وشك الإفلاس بعد أن أنفقت ثروة لإنقاذي. ‘سأسدد الثروة التي ضاعت والديون المُهدرة قبل رحيلي!’ كنت أنوي استخدام قدراتي فحسب لجمع المعلومات والثروة لأعيش أيامي المتبقية… ‘مَن هناك؟’ ‘أنت تشبهين…الملاك.’ ‘يا لجرأتكِ حتى تقتحمي حلمي دون خوف.’ يبدو أنني تدخلت في أحلام ما كان يجدر بي أن أمسّها.
description.en:
I was born with the ability to enter other people's dreams. And I thought that in this life, I would have an easy life as a count when... 

"I don't think Lady Miena will survive this winter." 

Another life with a limited lifespan... To make matters worse, my family is going broke trying to save me. Before I die, I need to pay back our debt and all the money wasted on me! I was just trying to collect useful information and money before passing away when... 

"Who are you?"

"An angel... no you don't look quite right..."

"You entered my dream without a hint of fear."

I fear I have entered a dream I should've have touched.

altTitles.ja: かわいい後輩に言わされたい

altTitles.en: I Want to be Teased by a Cute Junior

altTitles.zh-hk: 可愛後輩想讓我說出口

altTitles.pt-br: Eu quero ser provocado por uma kouhai fofa

description.en: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
description.ja: まったく素直じゃない後輩・守山ちゃんは、自分にアプローチさせようと野洲先輩を挑発したり、時には大胆にアクションしたり…!?
description.pt-br: Yasu gosta da sua kouhai, Moriyama, que é ao mesmo tempo extremamente assertiva, inexpressiva e extremamente passiva-agressiva.

altTitles.es-la: Ella Es La Hija Perdida Del Emperador

description.en:
Embodying the culture that I experienced in my previous life,
A ‘reincarnator’ with the ability to make the empire flourish.
Rossite is able to use her unique ability, the power of implementation.
Being bullied by the reincarnator Karina she was even accused of attempting to murder the Duke of Identino, which lead to her execution.
At that moment, I recalled the memories of my past life as a paramedic,
Rossite realizes that she is the real reincarnator and regresses in the brink of death.
The first thing Rossite saw after her regression was Duke Identino, saying he has come to find the ‘Emperor’s lost daughter.’
Rossite goes to the imperial capital with him, but even there, Karina slanders Rossite by spreading rumors that she is a fake

title.en: I Will Rewrite the Dead End Novel

altTitles.en: I'm Going to Rewrite the Devastating Novel

description.en:
[Let's get rid of this psychopath before that]

Yes, I possessed someone.

But who I was in my previous life.
I can't remember at all.

All I remember is,
just this guy's face that filled my eyes.

The day I woke up for the first time as a wizard's experiment,
we were together.

Strangely enough, about my previous life,
this guy seems to know better about it than I do.

In a dead-end novel,
you are the only one you can trust and rely on...

In order to live,
I have to run away from this guy.

In the future, he will kill the female lead's entire family.
It's because he's a psychopath whose view on the world is final darkness.

After a while...

Finally, out of his grasp,
I thought I could live a peaceful life─

"You cruelly abandoned me."

This guy, he finally found me.

"Did you enjoy playing with me?"

Now, he can't even be compared to his past self.
He went completely mad.
description.ko:
[그 전에 이 사이코패스부터 치워버리고요]

그래, 빙의했다.

그런데 내가 전생에 누구였는지
도무지 기억이 나지 않는다. 

기억나는 것이라고는,
눈 앞을 가득 채우던 이 녀석의 얼굴뿐.

마법사의 실험체로서 처음으로 눈 뜬 그 날
우린 함께 태어났다.

이상하게도 내 전생에 대해
나보다도 더 잘 알고 있는 것 같은 이녀석.

이 막장의 끝을 달리는 피폐한 소설 속에서
유일하게 믿고 의지할 수 있는 존재여야하건만…

살기 위해서는,
이놈에게서 도망쳐야 한다.

장차 여자주인공의 가족을 모두 살해하고
세계관 최종 흑막에 등극하는 사이코패스니까. 

시간이 흐른 뒤…

마침내 녀석의 손아귀에 벗어나
평화로운 일상을 맞이하나 싶었는데─

"너는 잔인하게 날 버리고 떠났지."

기어코 나를 찾아내고 말았다, 이 녀석은. 

"날 가지고 노는 동안 즐거웠나?"

그것도 과거와 비교도 안될 만큼
단단히 미쳐버린 채로.

altTitles.it: Il bar "Nobu" di un mondo parallelo

altTitles.th: อิซากายะต่างโลกโนบุ

description.en:
Imagine there is a bar with many weird kind of food and drink that might bring you to another world! The bar, so-called "Nobu" is located in a alley of the old city Aiteria. At the very first step, diners feels like falling into another completely country, with cold, super cool beer, so-called "Toriaezu Nama"! (from: MU)  
  
Adapted from [web novel (raw)](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n9773bj/) / light novel of same name.  

[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20594)

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%95%B0%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%B1%85%E9%85%92%E5%B1%8B%E3%80%8C%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B6%E3%80%8D)

One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...

altTitles.vi: Tụi mình không có hẹn hò

description.en:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
description.id:
Sebuah karya baru dari author Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim

“Kenapa kamu terus tanya kalau kita pacaran? Kita cuma bergandengan tangan, kita nggak pacaran!!”

title.en: Wasn't this supposed to be a strategy game?

description.en:
I’ve possessed a hidden character in a notorious strategy game with a 0% clear rate.
To escape this game, I must bring peace to the empire…
“So, from now on, I’ll trust only you, Priest.”
“You’d better give up on that plan.”
“Priest, did you really use me?”
“For some reason, I feel something special from you, Priest.”
“You promised you’d come back.”
…Why is my favorability rising, and why does it feel like this is turning into a reverse harem?
Excuse me, wasn’t this supposed to be a strategy game?

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

description.en: Following a similar narrative to its predecessor (Fuwari! Donpatch), Honnori! Donpatch is a slice of life involving Beauty living with Donpatch. Here, however, it is not a parody, but more a pastiche of Kiyohiko Azuma's beloved slice of life series Yostuba&!
description.ja: 不思議な生物・首領パッチと暮らすビュティ。二人は河原を散歩したり、友達とカラオケしたり、たまに喧嘩もするけど、ほんのりとした日常を過ごしています。だけど首領パッチの知り合いという破天荒が現れて!?

altTitles.ja: 両片思いオーバーキル！

altTitles.zh: 双向单相思杀伤力太高了！

description.en: "I never thought I would fall in love..." "But I'm not sure how I feel about this person, much less this other person!" You can't have it both ways!
description.ja: 秋生当意の通う男子校と、紅緒千羽耶の通う女子校は隣り合わせに立っていながら異常なまでに仲が悪い！ ロミジュリ的な立場な2人はある日お互いに恋に落ちてしまう！ この両片思いは果たして成就するのか…!?

description.en:
Inept at dealing with people, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?!

The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!

altTitles.ja: ぷにるはかわいいスライム

description.en: The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
description.ja: コロコロ史上初、異色のラブコメまんが！！ 自分の作ったスライムが女の子に変身!?　ぷにるの自由気ままな言動に少年・コタローは振り回されっぱなし。毎日愉快なドキドキ生活だ!!

altTitles.en: An Angel Flew Down to Me!

altTitles.ja: 私に天使が舞い降りた!

description.en: The four-panel comedy manga's story centers on Miyako Hoshino, a shy college student and otaku. Miyako's younger sister Hinata, who is a fifth grader, has a classmate and friend named Hana. When they meet, Miyako falls for Hana at first sight.
description.es-la: La historia de este manga cómico 4-Koma se centra en Miyako Hoshino, una tímida estudiante universitaria y otaku. La hermana pequeña de Miyako, Hinata, que está en quinto grado, tiene una compañera de clase y amiga llamada Hana. Cuando se conocen, Miyako se enamora de Hana a primera vista...

title.en: Sono Bisque Doll wa Koi o Suru

altTitles.ja: その着せ替え人形は恋をする

altTitles.es-la: Esa muñeca de porcelana está enamorada

altTitles.th: หนุ่มเย็บผ้ากับสาวนักคอสเพลย์

altTitles.vi: Cô Nàng Nổi Loạn X Chàng Thợ May
Nàng Búp Bê Thử Đồ Của Tôi Biết Yêu

altTitles.ja-ro: Sono Bisque Doll ha Koi wo Suru

altTitles.en: The Bisque Doll Is Falling in Love
The Bisque Doll Falls in Love

description.en: Wakana Gojou is a fifteen year old high-school boy who was socially traumatized in the past due to his passions. That incident left a mark on him that made him into a social recluse. Until one day he had an encounter with Kitagawa who is a sociable gyaru, who is the complete opposite of him. They soon share their passions with one another which leads to their odd relationship.
description.fr:
Wakana Gojo est un lycéen solitaire. Son rêve est de devenir artisan et de fabriquer les poupées traditionnelles pour le Hina Matsuri. Mais comme cette passion n’est pas très virile, il la cache et ne se fait pas remarquer. Jusqu’au jour ou Marine Kitagawa, la fille la plus populaire du lycée, le voit se servir d’une machine à coudre ! Contre toute attente elle lui demande de devenir son couturier pour réaliser… des tenues de cosplay !

---

Maison d'édition FR : **Kana**
description.tr: Wakana Gojou, vadesi geçmiş tutkuları nedeniyle toplumsal travmaları olan 15 yaşında bir liselidir. Bu olayın bıraktığı iz onu toplumdan uzak biri haline getirdi. Bir gün kendisinin tam zıttı, arkadaş canlısı bir gal olan Kitagawa ile karşılaşır. Kısa zamanda garip ilişkilerini yönlendiren tutkularını paylaşırlar.
description.uk:
Вакана Ґоджьо — п’ятнадцятилітній учень старшої школи, в минулому отримав серйозну психологічну травму на фоні свого захоплення. Внаслідок чого хлопець ізолював себе від соціуму і почав вести затворницький образ життя.
Так було би і на далі, але в життя Ґоджьо буквально увірвалась Кітаґава — дружелюбна і комунікабельна дівчина, повна його протилежність. Досить швидко вони розділили хоббі один одного, що і привело до їх досить дивних, але міцних відносин.
description.vi: Wakana Gojou 15 tuổi là 1 học sinh cao trung từng bị tổn thương tâm lý trong quá khứ do sở thích kỳ lạ của mình. Chuyện đó đã khiến cậu trở nên nhút nhát, rụt rè. Cho tới ngày nọ Gojou tình cờ gặp Kitagawa – một Gyaru – người có tính cách trái ngược hoàn toàn với cậu ấy. 2 người họ hóa ra đều có những điểm chung và đã tạo thành một mối quan hệ hài hước
description.es-la: Wakana Gojou es un joven de quince años de edad que se vio traumatizado socialmente en el pasado debido a sus pasiones. Ese incidente le dejó una marca que lo convirtió en un recluso social. Hasta que un día tuvo un encuentro con Kitagawa, una gyaru sociable, que es todo lo contrario a él. Pronto comparten sus pasiones entre sí, lo que da lugar a su extraña relación.
description.pt-br: Wakana Gojou é um garoto de quinze anos que foi socialmente traumatizado no passado devido a suas paixões. Aquele incidente deixou uma marca nele que o fez ser um recluso social. Até que um dia ele teve um encontro com Kitagawa, que é um gyaru sociável, que é o completo oposto dele. Eles logo compartilham suas paixões uns com os outros, o que leva a um relacionamento estranho.

description.en:
Riat, caught up in her husband's treason, faces death.

After repeatedly returning to the past at the cost of half her lifespan, she finally breaks the cycle by offering her husband’s head to the emperor.

With only 1 year and 3 months left to live, her one wish is—

"I’m going to fall in love."

At last, an announcement spreads across the entire empire: a competition to find Riat’s new husband, with a grand prize of 1 billion gold.

Candidates begin to flood in, but suspicious figures also start gathering around her…

title.en: Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de

altTitles.ja: 痣だらけのクラスメイトが心配で

altTitles.en: I'm Worried About My Classmate Who's Covered in Bruises

altTitles.pt-br: Estou preocupado com minha colega de classe coberta de hematomas

altTitles.ro: Sunt îngrijorat Pentru o Colegă Acoperită de Vânătăi

altTitles.ru: Я беспокоюсь о своей однокласснице покрытой синяками

altTitles.tr: Her Tarafı Bandaj Kaplı Olan Sınıf Arkadaşım Hakkında Endişeleniyorum

altTitles.vi: Tôi lo lắng cho người bạn cùng lớp đầy những vết bầm tím

altTitles.uk: Я турбуюсь про однокласницю, покриту синцями

altTitles.ja: 痣だらけのクラスメイト

altTitles.en: My Classmate Who's Covered in Bruises

altTitles.th: เพื่อนนักเรียนของผมที่มีรอยขีดข่วนเต็มตัวไปหมด

description.en:
A girl in my class is always injured somewhere on her body, and it's not unusual for her to come to school covered in bandages. At a glance, one can tell that this girl is saddled with problems and so no one tries to get involved with her. Even so... I couldn't help myself from being concerned about her.

This is a story about a pair of classmates whose hearts will be brought together under extreme circumstances.

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Note: The original Twitter series has been collected and published into 1 volume under the name Azadarake no Classmate (痣だらけのクラスメイト) by Kadokawa through their Dengeki Comics EX label.

Additional Links

* [Kadokawa](https://store.kadokawa.co.jp/shop/g/g322312000753/) (Publisher)
* [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/20079655/vol_no/001)
description.ja:
総「いいね」数300万超！
SNSで大反響の、痛々しくも温かい限界ラブコメーー大幅加筆で待望の書籍化！

いつもどこかを怪我していて、
包帯姿で学校にくることも珍しくないクラスの女子。
見るからに問題を抱えた彼女に
クラスの誰もが関わりを持とうとしなかった。
だけど……俺はどうしても
その子のことが気になってしまって……。
限界の環境で心を寄せる二人の物語。

title.en: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブ 便利屋68業務日誌

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Nhật kí nghiệp vụ của Handyman 68

description.en: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!
description.ja: 大人気スマホゲーム『ブルーアーカイブ』から、「便利屋68」を主役としたスピンオフコミックが登場!! 学園都市キヴォトスを舞台に便利屋の4人が巻き起こすドタバタ劇をお楽しみください！
description.vi: Từ trò chơi dành cho smartphone đang nổi tiếng hiện nay "Blue Archive" chào đón sự xuất hiện dưới tư cách nhân vật chính của câu lạc bộ "Handyman 68 (Công ty Dịch vụ giúp việc số 68)" trong bộ manga ngoại truyện này!! Hãy cùng thưởng thức câu chuyện hài hước của bốn cô gái chạy vặt ở Thành phố Học viện Kivotos nào!

description.en: Min Hu Chu, a guy who lives to eat and So Geum Ji, a girl who eats to live. They’re both childhood friends but with complete different opinions on the purpose of food. Focusing on these two characters, introducing a story that includes recipes to make alone(?) and their campus life(!) The author of ‘Second Lead Complex’, Soi’s beginning of a new series!
description.ko: 먹기 위해 사는 민후추와 살기 위해 먹는 소금지. 소꼽친구지 만 음식에 대한 가치관이 전혀 다른 두 사람. 둘을 중심으로 펼 쳐지는 자취 요리(?)와 캠퍼스 라이프(!) 서브 콤플렉스 소이 작가의 신작!

title.en: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru

altTitles.ja: となりの席のヤツがそういう目で見てくる

altTitles.es-la: La persona sentada a mi lado me mira de esa manera
La persona de al lado me mira con esos ojos

altTitles.uk: Однокласниця що сидить біля мене, дивиться на мене хтивими очима

altTitles.en: The weirdo one desk over keeps giving me THAT kind of look

description.en: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
description.ja: 主人公の池沢くんは、同じクラスの美少女・江口さんのことを「そういう目」で見ている。しかし実は、江口さんも「そういう目」で池沢くんのことを見ていて！？チラ見えする筋肉、汗ばむ肌、髪の香り…互いに興味津々な2人の「下心」から始まる純愛ラブコメ！好きな人のなら、臭いも汗も×××も…全部好き。

description.en:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
description.ja: これは少し未来のお話。超少子化が進み、様々な風習が失われた近未来。大黒愛護学園に通う普通の少年、三田は、なぜか同級生の冬村四織に命を狙われていた。突如として振り下ろされる凶刃。それには、行方不明になった冬村の友人と、三田が抱えている「とある呪い」に理由があって…!?

altTitles.ja: シャドーハウス カラー版

description.en:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
description.es:
Nobles sombras sin rostro que viven en una vasta mansión, atendidos por muñecos vivientes que pasan gran parte de su tiempo limpiando el hollín emitido por sus misteriosos maestros.  
  
Sigue la historia de Emilyko, una joven y alegre muñeca viviente, mientras aprende sus deberes como asistente de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.ja: 不思議な洋館に住む、 顔のないシャドー一族と、 世話係の“生き人形”たち。 彼らが織りなす、 摩訶不思議な日常とは…？
description.ru: Безликие теневые дворяне, живущие в огромном особняке, сопровождаемые живыми куклами, которые проводят большую часть своего времени, очищая сажу, бесконечно испускаемую их таинственными хозяевами.
description.es-la: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.
description.pt-br: Sombras nobres vivem em uma imensa mansão e são servidos por bonecas vivas que passam a maior parte do tempo limpando a fuligem solta pelos misteriosos mestres. Siga a história de Emilyko, uma boneca viva jovem e animada, enquanto ela aprende seus deveres como serva de Kate Shadow-sama.

title.en: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses

description.en:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
description.ja: 東大現役合格の秀才・粕壁 隼。ケンカ別れしていた祖母の訃報を聞いて、3年ぶりに海辺の町の古びた実家「カフェテラス・ファミリア」に帰ると、そこには見知らぬ５人の女の子が！ しかも彼女たちは「おばあちゃんの家族」を名乗り…!? 運命の女×５との贅沢すぎる共同生活が始まるっ！『涼風』『君町』『風夏』の瀬尾公治が描く一つ屋根の下ハーレム！ どの娘に恋する？どの娘を愛でる？
description.ru: Спустя три года, после ссоры со своей бабушкой, Хаято Касукабэ возвращается в свой родной дом в котором поселилось пять девушек. Выясняется, что бабушка Хаято позволила девушкам жить в этом доме, а те заботились о ней до самой её смерти. Так начинается история Хаято и пяти "Богинь".
description.vi: Kasukabe Hayato đã được nhận vào Đại Học Tokyo ngay trong lần thi đầu tiên. Nhưng sau khi nhận được tin bà nội qua đời, anh trở về ngôi nhà thời thơ ấu của mình, quán cà phê Familia.  Và thấy 5 cô gái lạ mặt tự xưng là "Gia đình của bà"! Cuộc sống mới của Hayato tại một thị trấn ven biển với năm cô gái định mệnh bắt đầu từ đây!

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。 『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

altTitles.ja: 星野ヒバナはみつがれる

description.en:
A group of powerful beings called tenkaijin are holding a special tournament. The rules of the game–each tenkaijin selects a kid in junior high to be his champion and grants him a special power. The kids take each other on in heated battle, but if they hurt innocent bystanders, then they lose one of their natural-given abilities. Every time they win a battle, they gain a new ability. The ultimate winner of the tournament is granted any power of his choosing, and the tenkajin who he represents succeeds in becoming the next god. Kosuke Ueki has been chosen to fight in the tournament. His special power–the ability to turn garbage into trees.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **The Law of Ueki** (2006)

altTitles.ja: TS衛生兵さんの戦場日記

altTitles.pt-br: Diário de Guerra da Enfermeira Transgênero

description.en:
An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams, but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover, he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?!

After her aptitude for healing magic was discovered, she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic, all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However, without even getting magic training, she was attached to an assault squad, repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the "Western Front."
The mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace, Garback, and not let him die at any cost. But he turned out to be the worst commander, who will try to get results whatever the cost, even if it means the death of his subordinates!

On the battlefield, mired in unreasonable orders and violence, Touri's fierce battle for survival continues...
description.ja:
FPSの元プロゲーマー♂が転生した世界は魔法が存在するファンタジー世界だった――が、そこには夢広がる冒険はなく、銃弾が飛び交う泥沼の戦場が待っていた！　しかも、トウリ・ノエルという名の孤児の「少女」として……!?

トウリは回復魔法への適性を見出され、生まれ育った孤児院への資金援助のため軍に志願し二等衛生兵となる。しかし魔法の訓練も受けないまま、彼女は最も過酷な戦闘が繰り広げられている「西部戦線」の突撃部隊へと配属されてしまう。
彼女に与えられた任務は戦線のエースであるガーバックの専属衛生兵となり、絶対に彼を死なせないこと。けれどガーバックは部下を見殺しにしてでも戦果を上げる最低の指揮官でもあった！

理不尽な命令と暴力が飛び交う戦場で、トウリはただ生き残るために奮闘するが――。

description.en: Yuki, a girl living in a rural town, studies art with the goal of becoming a painter in the city. One day, her sister leaves the town to fulfill her own dreams. Yuki boards the train with her to see her off, but during the journey, she is struck by a strange phenomenon!? Is it reality or an illusion... A chilling horror.

altTitles.ja: 七つ屋 志のぶの宝石匣

description.en:
The story is set around a pawn shop in Shitamachi, a working-class neighborhood, and it follows Shinobu and Aki, 
two people fascinated by sparkling jewels metaphorically “born from a distant ancient Earth”.

Milo lives in a world where interacting with androids is completely normal. And now, he lives with TWO androids built by his sister. How safe is he living with androids who have deadly strength? Why did his sister gift him a "bodyguard android?" Well, he's about to find out the hard way.  
Source: Webtoon
description.pl: Pewnego dnia przybył prezent urodzinowy od mojej zmarłej siostry …

description.en: On his first day of transferring to a new high school, a loner named Mori Buntarou, is cajoled by a classmate into climbing the school building. Despite knowing that one misstep could send him spiraling to his death, he moves forward, and upon finally reaching the top, Mori experiences a sense of fulfillment. That feeling, which seems to be telling him, "You're alive!" gives birth to an adrenaline for rock-climbing.
description.ru:
В старшей школе Северной Ёкосуки новый, необычный ученик – Мори Бунтаро. В первый же день он отдает предпочтение крыше здания, чем ее кабинетам, где со всех сторон сыплются расспросы. Чтобы отвязаться от надоедливых одноклассников, лихо спрыгивающих с карниза вниз по веревке, Мори совершает безумный поступок: без страховки забирается на крышу по трубе, да еще в таком месте, где это достаточно проблематично, даже для тренированного человека! Одноклассник Миямото и Ониси-сенсей в ужасе и восторге, ведь они профессиональные скалолазы, а тут появляется такой способный ученик! Но Мори не разделяет их восторга и не принимает помощи. Нелюдимый и гордый, он всего добивается в одиночку, и трудности скалолазания его не пугают. Он собирается покорять вершину за вершиной, с каждый разом поднимаясь все выше.   
  
Note: Sakamoto Shinichi did both the story and the art from Volume 4 onwards.  
  


---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Delcourt](https://www.editions-delcourt.fr/mangas/series/serie-ascension)

title.en: GATE - Jieitai Kanochi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri

altTitles.fr: Gate - Au delà de la porte

altTitles.ja-ro: Gate - Jieitai Kare no chi nite
Gate Jietai Kare no Chi nite, Kaku Tatakeri

altTitles.en: Gate: Thus the JSDF Fought There!

altTitles.th: เกท:หน่วยรบตะลุยโลกต่างมิติ

altTitles.ja: ゲート 自衛隊彼の地にて、斯く戦えり

altTitles.zh-hk: 門 自衛隊在彼之地如此戰鬥

altTitles.ar: غيت: قوات الدفاع الذاتي تقاتل في أرض غريبة

altTitles.ko: 게이트 - 자위대. 그의 땅에서, 이처럼 싸우며

altTitles.ja-ro: Gate Jieitai Kare no Ji Nite, Kaku Tatakaeri

altTitles.az: Darvaza: Buna görə Yaponiya Özünümüdafiə Qüvvələri orada döyüşdü!‎

altTitles.en: Gate: Thus the Japanese Self-Defense Force Fought There

altTitles.de: Tor: So kämpften die Selbstverteidigungsstreitkräfte an jenem Ort

altTitles.fr: Gate : Ainsi les forces d'autodéfense japonaises ont combattu là-bas

altTitles.it: Gate: in quella terra, le forze di autodifesa combattono così

altTitles.pt: Portal: E assim, as Forças de Autodefesa lutaram

altTitles.vi: Cánh Cổng Hư Không Sau Bóng Tối

altTitles.tr: Geçit: Ve Bu Yüzden Öz Savunma Kuvvetleri Savaştı

description.en:
A gate appears in Tokyo's Ginza district sometime in the 21st century. From the gate pours out monsters, knights from middle-age Europe, and other fantasy-like beings, and they kill many of the citizens of Tokyo. This event is known as the Ginza Incident.  
The government sends a small group of soldiers from the Japanese Self-Defense Forces to the alternate world beyond the gate. Led by otaku soldier Youji, they find that the villages in the world are being attacked by a dragon. An elf girl who is a survivor from the dragon's rampage joins the group in their travels across the dangerous new world.  
  
 [Official Thai](https://shopee.co.th/Gate-%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B4-%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B0-1-10-i.30847586.4202197419)

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B2%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88_%E8%87%AA%E8%A1%9B%E9%9A%8A_%E5%BD%BC%E3%81%AE%E5%9C%B0%E3%81%AB%E3%81%A6%E3%80%81%E6%96%AF%E3%81%8F%E6%88%A6%E3%81%88%E3%82%8A)
description.vi: Một cánh cổng kì lạ xuất hiện ở quận Ginza của thành phố Tokyo vào giữa thế kỉ 21. Từ cánh cổng đó đổ ra những con quái vật, những chiến binh từ thời Trung Âu, những thứ chỉ có trong tưởng tượng khác và chúng đã giết chết rất nhiều người dân của Tokyo. Sự kiện này được biết đến với cái tên Ginza Incident. Chính phủ đã gửi một nhóm nhỏ các binh sĩ của Lực lượng Phòng vệ Nhật Bản (thay cho lực lượng quân đội) để đến thế giới bên kia cánh cổng. Được dẫn dắt bởi người lính otaku, và họ đã nhìn thấy một ngôi làng đang bị tấn công bỏi một con rồng. Một tiểu tinh nữ đã sống sót sau cơn thịnh nộ của con rồng đã gia nhập vào nhóm lính và cùng nhau thám hiểm thế giới mới đầy nguy hiểm

altTitles.ja: 異世界バトルロイヤル

description.en: A man in armor with the power of darkness, Ares the Dark Knight, was heading to the Demon King's Castle as a member of the Brave Party. Hoping to defeat the Demon King and make a triumphant return to the hometown of Lulua, the hero's wise younger sister... And in the midst of the final battle, just as Ares delivers a dark blow... with signs of being taken somewhere, out of nowhere something takes you to another world. It feels like you've been caught up in a battle royale, in which strong people from various worlds participate!?  To return to the original world with Lulua, who was separated, the dark knight Ares fights.
description.ja: 暗黒騎士アレスは、勇者一行のメンバーとして魔王討伐の最終局面を迎えていた。勝って勇者の妹であり賢者のルルアと結婚するという大願を胸に、アレスが全力解放した闇の一撃を放とうとした刹那・・・何者かの手により異世界に転送され、各世界の強者たちが殺し合いをする異世界バトルロイヤルに巻き込まれてしまう。そして運命的に出会った女子高生シュリの助けを頼りに、この世界を生き抜いていくことになるのだが――。暗黒騎士が、剣と闇の力で斬りまくる！！
description.pt-br: Um homem de armadura com o poder das trevas, Ares o Cavaleiro das trevas,estava indo para o Castelo do Rei Demônio como membro do Brave Party. Com a esperança de derrotar o Rei Demônio e fazer um retorno triunfante à cidade natal de Lulua, a sábia e irmã mais nova do herói… E no meio da batalha final, no momento em que Ares desfere um golpe sombrio… com sinais de estar sendo levado a algum lugar, do nada algo o leva para outro mundo. Parece que você foi pego em uma batalha real, na qual pessoas fortes de vários mundos participam!? Para voltar ao mundo original com Lulua, que foi separada, o cavaleiro das trevas Ares luta. A história de tentar ser o mais forte em outro mundo começa!

title.en: Blue Archive - Game Kaihatsubu Dai Bouken!

altTitles.ja: ブルーアーカイブゲーム開発部だいぼうけん！

altTitles.en: Blue Archive: The Adventure of Game Development Department!

altTitles.ru: Blue Archive: Грандиозное приключение отдела разработки игр!

altTitles.vi: Blue Archive: Cuộc phiêu lưu của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game

altTitles.id: Arsip Biru: Petualangan Besar Ekskul Pengembangan Game

description.en: From the hit game Blue Archive, comes a spin-off manga featuring the Game Development Department! Where Momoi, Midori, Yuzu and Aris share their days of youth, friendship, and clumsy moments.
description.id: Diadaptasi dari game terkenal Blue Archive, ini adalah sebuah manga spin-off yang menceritakan tentang ekskul pengembangan game dimana Momoi, Midori, Yuzu, dan Arisu menikmati masa muda, pertemanan, dan hari-hari penuh kegokilan.
description.ja: 人気ゲーム「ブルーアーカイブ」よりゲーム開発部のスピンオフが登場！モモイ、ミドリ、ユズ、アリスの4人が送る青春、友情、ぽんこつの日々...。
description.ru: Спин-офф манга по мотивам популярной игры Blue Archive, в которой девочки из отдела разработки игр делятся смешными историями о своей юности и дружбе. Это душевная и милая история, созданная мастером комедии Мидзу Асато!
description.vi: Bộ truyện chuyển thể từ trò chơi đang làm mưa làm gió "Blue Archive" với sự xuất hiện của Câu lạc bộ Phát Triển Game! Nơi Momoi, Midori, Yuzu và Arisu cùng nhau sẻ chia những năm tháng của tuổi trẻ, tình bạn và những khoảnh khoắc vụng về. Đây là một câu chuyện ấm lòng, hài hước và dễ thương từ Bậc thầy Truyện hài Mizu Asato!

description.en: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!

"He", a police officer on his shift, happened to meet "her" on the streets, by chance.

Through its bold, yet delicate brushwork and elegant prose, this stylish, full-colour comic illustrates the subtle air of intimacy between these two individuals.

---
A chance encounter. A handsome policeman. A beautiful woman. A tentative love affair smolders on the snowy cobblestone streets, out of sight of those that might keep them apart. 

*Veil* is a beautifully illustrated full-color romance manga, told in stylish short vignettes, beautiful illustrations, and secret moments.
description.pt-br: Eles se conheceram na rua por acaso. Ele era policial e ela caminhava pela rua. Através de suas pinceladas ousadas, mas delicadas e diálogos elegantes, esta história refinada e colorida, ilustra o ar sutil da intimidade presente entre os dois.

description.en: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.vi: Thợ Săn là những người đi chu du thế giới, đối mặt với hiểm nguy. Từ bắt giữ tội phạm cho đến nhưng cuộc thám hiểm trên các hòn đảo để tìm kho báu. Câu chuyện bắt đầu khi người cha của một cậu bé tên Gon mất tích đã khá lâu, nên cậu bé quyết định trở thành Thợ Săn với hy vọng tìm được cha mình. Khi được 12 tuổi Gon bắt đầu cuộc hành trình của mình để được tham gia vào "Cuộc thi Thợ Săn Kỳ Tài", ai cũng biết tỉ lệ thành công rất thấp, có khi chết lúc nào không hay. Trong cuộc thi cậu đã kết bạn với Kurapica, Leorio và Killua. Với tình bạn, họ đã trải qua biết bao nhiêu là thử thách, hiểm nguy trên cuộc hành trình của một người Thợ Săn... Còn về phần họ trải qua những thử thách gì và như thế nào thì mời các bạn theo dõi...
description.es-la: Sigue la historia de Gon Freecss, un joven que descubre que su padre, a quien creía muerto, es un legendario Cazador, un miembro de una élite que se especializa en localizar tesoros, bestias raras o personas peligrosas. Decidido a encontrar a su padre, Gon emprende un viaje para convertirse en Cazador. En su camino, se enfrenta a desafíos mortales y forma fuertes lazos con amigos como Killua, Leorio y Kurapika. A medida que avanza en su viaje, Gon descubre que el mundo de los Cazadores es mucho más peligroso y complejo de lo que imaginaba.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

altTitles.th: ผู้ชนะรักนี้ต้องเป็นฉัน

description.en: Although Captain is handsome, kind, and good at sports, he’s also an avid gamer. That’s the reason why Kiss decided to start learning how to play games in hopes of winning over the senior she has a crush on. However, this turned out to be the beginning of an unexpected online relationship between Kiss and Michael, who is secretly the world's number one pro player!

altTitles.zh: 神乎其技 - 特效化妝師

description.en: Kohei Nagase is an prodigy special effects artist. He and pro stuntman, Shingo Kannazuki, form Studio Gimmick. Together, they help people in need of Studio Gimmick's exceptional services. These people's problems are often able to be solved with Kohei's stunning special effects skills.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

title.en: Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu -squall-

altTitles.ja-ro: Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu -squall-

altTitles.es-la: Un verano de amor que comienza con una mentira -squall-

altTitles.en: Summer Love Begins with a Lie -squall-

description.en:
Kaoru, who had run away from home, is found and protected by her main teacher, Mirei, in the rain. At school, the teacher seemed like a responsible adult, but at home, her attitude is careless, drinking alcohol during the day and making jokes with a smile on her face. However, she accepts and understands the worries that Kaoru could not cope with.... Thus begins the faltering romance of two people who cannot yet become adults.

An official manga adapting the visual novel "Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu" that was not shown in the main story, focusing on the relationship between a teacher and her student, portraying a love story, Youth ✕ Summer ✕ Yuri.
description.es-la:
Kaoru, quien había huido de casa, es encontrada y protegida por su profesora principal, Mirei, bajo la lluvia. En la escuela, la profesora parecía una adulta responsable, pero en casa, su actitud es descuidada, bebe alcohol durante el día y hace bromas con una sonrisa en el rostro. Sin embargo, acepta y comprende las preocupaciones con las que Kaoru no podía enfrentarse... Así comienza el titubeante romance de dos personas que aún no pueden convertirse en adultas.

Un manga oficial que adapta la novela visual "Uso kara Hajimaru Koi no Natsu" que no se mostró en la historia principal, centrándose en la relación entre una profesora y su alumna, retratando una historia de amor, Juventud ✕ Verano ✕ Yuri.

altTitles.ja: リコリス・リコイル 公式コミックアンソロジー リピート

description.en:
Lycoris Recoil manga anthology by various artists.

title.en: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!

altTitles.vi: Trở thành diễn viên hàng đầu nhờ vào việc đọc sách

description.en:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

“If I’m born again, I have to act,” he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!

The exorcist fell in love with me, a ghost...?!

A survival love story of a ghost who resorted to a false confession to survive from the exorcist.
description.ko:
퇴마사가 귀신인 나에게 반해버렸다...?! 
퇴마사로부터 살아남기 위해 거짓 고백을 해버린 한 귀신의 생존 서바이벌 연애기
description.ru: Вы бы признались кому-то в любви, если бы это означало спасение вашей жизни? Ну, это то, что я сделал. Я призрак по имени Умин, а моя девушка - охотница за привидениями. Довольно банально, я знаю... Честно говоря, я не знаю, как мне избавиться от нее, но я не могу позволить ей просто убить меня!

description.en:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange love-comedy begins!

WARNING: NTR IN LATER CHAPTER

Niwa Tasuku working at Sanden Printing Company for 2 years now but still can't get along at all with with Yukino Tsumugi, a female colleague at the DTP department. Their colleagues try to 'break the ice' by inviting them out for drinks but later that night, they ended up in a love hotel. A strange "connection" is made between these two, one that would 'link' them during the most private thoughts and moments!
description.ru: Нива Тасуку работает в полиграфической компании «Sanden» уже 2 года, но до сих пор не может поладить с Юкино Цумуги из издательского отдела. Коллеги пытаются сблизить их, пригласив выпить, но этой же ночью они оказываются в любовном отеле. Между ними возникает странная «связь», которая «соединяет» их в самые интимные моменты!
description.es-la: Niwa Tasuku ha trabajado en Sanden Printing Company durante 2 años, pero todavía no puede llevarse bien con Yukino Tsumugi, una colega del departamento de DTP. Sus compañeros intentan "romper el hielo" invitándolos a tomar unas copas, pero más tarde esa noche, terminaron en un motel. Se hace una extraña "conexión" entre estos dos, ¡una que los 'vincularía' durante los pensamientos y en los momentos más privados!

altTitles.en: Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

altTitles.fr: Se Marier avec une Sœur Amagami
Comment j'ai Marié une Sœur Amagami

altTitles.es-la: El Emparejamiento de la Familia Amagami

description.en: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine. A tale of love and miracles is about to unfold!
description.fr: Kamihate Uryuu, orphelin depuis l'enfance, reçoit une invitation à séjourner dans le sanctuaire shinto local. Tout ce qu'il voulait, c'était un endroit tranquille pour étudier afin de réaliser son rêve d'entrer dans une grande école de médecine, mais en arrivant sur place, il tombe sur trois belles demoiselles du sanctuaire... Le prêtre en chef lui demande d'épouser l'une d'entre elles et de prendre la succession du sanctuaire. Une histoire d'amour et de miracles est sur le point de se dérouler !
description.ja: 京大医学部を目指す高校生の上終 瓜生。児童養護施設育ちの瓜生は「甘神神社」の宮司さんに引き取られ、居候することに。受験勉強ができる環境があれば…と思っていたが、居候の条件は「婿養子として神社を継ぐ」こと!? しかも結婚相手は同居する巫女三姉妹!! 一つ屋根の下、巫女と紡ぐ恋と奇跡の物語、開幕!!
description.ru: Камихатэ Урю долгое время прожил в приюте, пока не был взят под опеку священником Тидори Амагами. Остановившись в храме, Урю узнаёт, что здесь живут три жрицы-сёстры, которые являются внучками главного священника. В конечном итоге, Тидори Амагами рассказывает, что взял парня под опеку, чтобы он женился на одной из его внучек и унаследовал храм, как его зять. Так начинается история любви и чудес с семьёй Амагами.
description.vi:
Được thực hiện bởi phụ tá của Negi Haruba và được chính tác giả của Gotou-bun khuyến khích xem thử. Từ Oneshot nay đã có series và được đông đảo mọi người đón nhận
Uryuu Kamihate chuyển đến Kyoto và tình cờ sống chung với 3 chị em Miko trong một ngôi đền. Tuy vậy cậu lại là một người không tin vào thần linh mà chỉ tin tưởng bản thân mình, chuyện gì sẽ xảy đến với Uryuu khi xung quanh cậu là 3 chị em vu nữ xinh đẹp đây?
description.es-la: Un chico que había perdido la fe en las Oraciones y los Dioses, de pronto conocerá a 3 hermosas Hermanas que son Doncellas del Templo donde comenzará a vivir, ¿Esto afectará de alguna Manera a nuestro Protagonista? Léelo para descubrirlo.
description.pt-br: Kamihate Uryuu, órfão desde a infância, recebe um convite para ficar no santuário xintoísta local. Tudo o que ele queria era um lugar tranquilo para estudar, para que pudesse realizar seu sonho de entrar para uma faculdade de medicina de ponta, mas depois de chegar lá, ele se depara com três belas irmãs donzelas do santuário... E o sacerdote chefe pede que ele se case com uma delas e assuma o santuário. Uma história de amor e milagres está prestes a se desenrolar!

description.en: <http://tasukeyashibeta.blog.fc2.com/>

As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
description.ko:
괴물처치부대 '스레투'가 사라진 지금. 인간들은 괴물들의 먹이가 되었다.
괴물이 가득한 세상에서 평생을 살아온 '진청도'는
전설의 아이템 '미드우트'를 이용해 과거로 가서
이 사태를 초래한 '이안'을 죽이려 하는데...
